channel.title: Power VIllage, Recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Power VIllage, Recruiting" - Power Village was just created, has three upgrades so far, and we need more people to join.

item.title: Power VIllage, Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Name: Power
Upgrades: 3

My village is going to be the best village ever, but I need more people to join, if you have alternative characters, and don't know what to do with them let them join my village, or you can just bring your main character in my village.
